Manifest_Description.message: Retrieve and store Mooltipass credentials easily from websites

OptionsHtml_Password_Generator_Descripti.message: An icon will be added to all password fields providing you a random password.

OptionsHtml_Advanced_Options_Description.message: These options are for advanced users.

OptionsHtml_Advanced_Options_Checkbox.message: Do not send a submit event after filling the credential fields

AboutHtml_About_Description.message: Mooltipass was created with the support of great people. It started as a Hackaday.io project, was successfully crowd-funded on Indiegogo, and developed to a real product at themooltipass.com.

AboutHtml_Contributors_Description.message: The following people made this project happen:

AboutHtml_Opensource_Description.message: This project is open source and can be found at github.com.

CredentialFieldsHtml_Description.message: If Mooltipass detects incorrect credential fields, you can specify correct fields by yourself. Just go to the page and click on the Mooltipass icon, select Select custom credential fields for this page.

BlacklistedSitesHtml_Description.message: Sites on this list do not prompt for password updates.
